name: dracula-foundry
description: A dark mode theming module for Foundry VTT based on Dracula, Darkula, and Dracula UI.
author: CasanovaSekova

scripts.build-release: sass ./styles/init.scss ./css/dracula-foundry.css && postcss ./css/dracula-foundry.css -p sass -u autoprefixer postcss-preset-env cssnano -m -o ./css/dracula-foundry.css
